messages.messageBody:
Thank you for your reply. You pointed out alot for me to consider. As for
the email address, when I set it up four years ago, I wanted something that
reflected how I wanted to homeschool. I wanted to follow my daughter's lead
I wasn't really thinking about educating as school-at-home. But I can see
how it looks that way. Thank you for reminding me that there is no high
school in unschooling. As I stated, I still have moments of panic! I am
amazed at what my girls are learning without me leaning over them,
prescribing every thought. They are getting more comfortable with it as I
grow more comfortable. Again, I thank you.
Peace,
Sarah



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
